title: 106_s1492
content: Repeals the mandate of the Board and the Committee to report biannually to the Congress on national economic trends, taking into account unemployment, investment, and productivity. Replaces such mandate with a mandate to consult semiannually with Congress, and to report on their plans and the time required to achieve price stability. Repeals the Full Employment and Balanced Growth Act of 1978 . Amends the Employment Act of 1946 and the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 to reflect the provisions of this Act.
